system.description:
At 17th level, you can perform a special ritual to give a community a head-start on recovering from a natural disaster, war, monster attack, or other large-scale event. To perform the ritual, you must spend 8 hours in uninterrupted work in a single location and it costs 1000 gp in material components. When the ritual completes, you may specify up to 1,000 targets of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.pblaa5w3f6tuqxuj]{Mending} effects, up to 50 targets of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.fe2d3gkhdwtibizq]{Purify Food and Drink} effects, and up to 5 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.tk8q47k7yjntw4c2]{Fabricate} effects.

In addition, you may choose one structure that has suffered damage, such as an Inn, Tower, or Main Gate and fully repair it using rubble or nearby raw materials. A massive castle, long road, or city walls may only be partially repaired by this ability, subject to Narrator discretion. All of the effects must take place within 1 mile of your position. Once you have used this feature, you can’t do so again for 7 days.
